Reviews.Title: A good cellphone/price deal
Reviews.Author: Anderson Orasma "Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought this cellphone like a gift for my nephew, he has 10 years old and this cellphone is fine for him, to use whatsapp or skype with his father, a big touch screen for games and more. The only problem for me, is about the battery life, because it lost charge even when the cellphone is off.

ProductInfo.Features:
4.0 inch capacitive touch screen, 800x 480 pixels
MTK6572 Dual core CPU, Cortex-A7, 1.2GHz
Networking: 2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby
2.0MP back camera and 0.3MP front camera, with flashlight, up to 1600x1200 pixels picture resolution
ProductInfo.Name: New Cubot C9+ 4.0 inch Android 4.2 Dual Core MTK6572 1.2GHz Dual Camera Dual SIM Dual Standby GSM Unlocked Smartphone Cell phone (Black&White)
